issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

If a cloud administrator does the following:

* Registers an SC
* Configures the 'storage.blockstoragemanager' to be a SAN provider supported by Eucalyptus
* Sets the cloud properties associated with the SAN provider set as the 'storage.blockstoragemanager'
* Deregisters the SC
* Re-registers the SC
* Reconfigures the 'storage.blockstoragemanager' to be the same SAN provider as previously set

All the cloud properties that were set are populated associated to with the SAN provider set for the 'storage.blockstoragemanager' come back populated with the original data.

*Signs*

* cloud properties after SC has been registered, SAN backend set for 'storage.blockstoragemanager', and cloud properties had been set.
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-properties | grep storage | grep acme
PROPERTY	acme.storage.blockstoragemanager	equallogic
PROPERTY	acme.storage.chapuser	eucaprc
PROPERTY	acme.storage.dasdevice	<unset>
PROPERTY	acme.storage.deletedvolexpiration	24
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxconcurrentsnapshotuploads	3
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxsnapshotpartsqueuesize	5
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxsnaptransferretries	50
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxtotalvolumesizeingb	100
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxvolumesizeingb	40
PROPERTY	acme.storage.multihostaccess	true
PROPERTY	acme.storage.ncpaths	nopath
PROPERTY	acme.storage.poolname	default
PROPERTY	acme.storage.resourceprefix	<unset>
PROPERTY	acme.storage.resourcesuffix	<unset>
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanhost	10.105.2.105
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanpassword	********
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanuser	grpadmin
PROPERTY	acme.storage.scpaths	nopath
PROPERTY	acme.storage.shouldtransfersnapshots	true
PROPERTY	acme.storage.snapshotpartsizeinmb	100
PROPERTY	acme.storage.snapshotuploadtimeoutinhours	48
PROPERTY	acme.storage.storeprefix	iqn.2009-06.com.eucalyptus.
PROPERTY	acme.storage.tasktimeout	300000
PROPERTY	acme.storage.tid	2
PROPERTY	acme.storage.timeoutinmillis	10000
PROPERTY	acme.storage.volumesdir	//var/lib/eucalyptus/volumes
PROPERTY	acme.storage.zerofillvolumes	false
{code}
* De-register SC; cloud properties right after
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca_conf --deregister-sc --partition acme --host 10.104.1.194 --component 194-storage-controller-equallogic

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-properties | grep storage
PROPERTY	objectstorage.bucket_creation_wait_interval_seconds	30
PROPERTY	objectstorage.bucket_naming_restrictions	extended
PROPERTY	objectstorage.cleanup_task_interval_seconds	60
PROPERTY	objectstorage.dogetputoncopyfail	false
PROPERTY	objectstorage.failed_put_timeout_hrs	168
PROPERTY	objectstorage.max_bucket_size_mb	5000
PROPERTY	objectstorage.max_buckets_per_account	100
PROPERTY	objectstorage.max_total_reporting_capacity_gb	2147483647
PROPERTY	objectstorage.providerclient	walrus
PROPERTY	objectstorage.queue_size	100
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.poolmaxactive	20
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.poolmaxidle	5
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.propertychangecheckinterval	15
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3accesskey	********
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3endpoint	s3.amazonaws.com
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3secretkey	********
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3usebackenddns	false
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3usehttps	false
PROPERTY	storage.global_total_snapshot_size_limit_gb	50
PROPERTY	walrusbackend.storagedir	//var/lib/eucalyptus/bukkits
PROPERTY	walrusbackend.storagemaxtotalcapacity	933
{code}
* Re-register SC, and set 'storage.blockstoragemanager':
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca_conf --register-sc --partition acme --host 10.104.1.194 --component 194-storage-controller-equallogic
SERVICE	storage        	acme    	194-storage-controller-equallogic	LOADED    	81  	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme:storage:194-storage-controller-equallogic/
Registered the first storage controller in partition 'acme'.  You must choose a storage back end with ``euca-modify-property -p acme.storage.blockstoragemanager=$BACKEND''
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-modify-property -p acme.storage.blockstoragemanager=equallogic
PROPERTY	acme.storage.blockstoragemanager	equallogic was <unset>
{code}
* Describe cloud properties
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-properties | grep storage | grep acme
PROPERTY	acme.storage.blockstoragemanager	equallogic
PROPERTY	acme.storage.chapuser	eucaprc
PROPERTY	acme.storage.dasdevice	<unset>
PROPERTY	acme.storage.deletedvolexpiration	24
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxconcurrentsnapshotuploads	3
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxsnapshotpartsqueuesize	5
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxsnaptransferretries	50
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxtotalvolumesizeingb	100
PROPERTY	acme.storage.maxvolumesizeingb	40
PROPERTY	acme.storage.multihostaccess	true
PROPERTY	acme.storage.ncpaths	nopath
PROPERTY	acme.storage.poolname	default
PROPERTY	acme.storage.resourceprefix	<unset>
PROPERTY	acme.storage.resourcesuffix	<unset>
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanhost	10.105.2.105
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanpassword	********
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanuser	grpadmin
PROPERTY	acme.storage.scpaths	nopath
PROPERTY	acme.storage.shouldtransfersnapshots	true
PROPERTY	acme.storage.snapshotpartsizeinmb	100
PROPERTY	acme.storage.snapshotuploadtimeoutinhours	48
PROPERTY	acme.storage.storeprefix	iqn.2009-06.com.eucalyptus.
PROPERTY	acme.storage.tasktimeout	300000
PROPERTY	acme.storage.tid	2
PROPERTY	acme.storage.timeoutinmillis	10000
PROPERTY	acme.storage.volumesdir	//var/lib/eucalyptus/volumes
PROPERTY	acme.storage.zerofillvolumes	false
{code}
* Output when cloud properties are being set
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-modify-property -p acme.storage.sanhost=10.105.2.105
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanhost	10.105.2.105 was 10.105.2.105
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-modify-property -p acme.storage.sanuser=grpadmin
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanuser	grpadmin was grpadmin
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-modify-property -p acme.storage.sanpassword=pwd*4grpadmin
PROPERTY	acme.storage.sanpassword	pwd*4grpadmin was ********
{code}
fields.summary: After Registering SC with SAN Backend, then Deregistering SC, then re-register SC with SAN Backend, Cloud Properties still kept values from previous registration

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-services
SERVICE	user-api          	API_55    	API_55               	ENABLED 	82  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/User-API	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:user-api:API_55/

SERVICE	euare             	API_55    	API_55.euare         	ENABLED 	82  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Euare	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:euare:API_55.euare/

SERVICE	objectstorage     	API_55    	API_55.objectstorage 	ENABLED 	82  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:objectstorage:API_55.objectstorage/
SERVICE	tokens            	API_55    	API_55.tokens        	ENABLED 	82  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:tokens:API_55.tokens/
SERVICE	cluster           	acme	194-cluster-controller	ENABLED 	82  	http://10.104.1.194:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme:cluster:194-cluster-controller/
SERVICE	storage           	acme	194-storage-controller-equallogic	ENABLED 	82  	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Storag	arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme:storage:194-storage-controller-equallogic/

SERVICE	cloudwatchbackend 	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	82  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	autoscalingbackend	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	82  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.104.10.55/

comments.body: This is a bit more tricky because the actual trigger for flushing property values would be the deregistration of the last SC in the cluster, not just any deregistration. I will investigate and scope for 4.1.0.
Marked this for 4.2.0, to be included in a broader re-examination of how we configure and manage the SC(s) and EBS for a Eucalyptus cloud. The current way is too complicated and user-unfriendly.
